content:
Hi all,

Right now, docs on doc.rust-lang.org take longer to load than they should, because the browser sends a lot of requests that get a 304 Not Modified response. This is particularly noticeable for the fonts, since loading the fonts late causes shifts on the page.

I filed https://github.com/rust-lang/simpleinfra/issues/62 suggesting to add caching headers, but I haven't heard back. Did I file it in the right place? Is there anything I can do to help get it done?
